Title: Deerma VC01 Max Cordless Stick Handheld Vacuum Cleaner Sweeping Mopping 12000Pa Powerful Suction 100W Brushless Motor Lightweight for Home Hard Floor Carpet Car Pet
specs: Main Features:● Powerful Brushless Motor: The built-in new type of brushless digital motor increases the suction power by 40% compared with the previous generation of vacuum cleaners.● Equipped with Wet Mopping Components: The wet mop component adopts the principle of slow seepage, and the water in the water tank evenly penetrates into the mop when working, which can easily drag away dirt and protect the ground.● Add Disinfectant As Needed: Disinfectant can be added to the water tank, mopping the floor and sterilizing at the same time.● Stand Upright, Easy to Remove: The wet mopping component adopts a magnetic design. It can be installed by pressing it down gently, and it can be disassembled when it is stepped on and lifted up.● Straight Air Duct Design: Adopting a straight air duct design, the suction force directly reaches the area where the ground dust is located, reducing loss.● 45min Battery Life: Newly added genergy lithium battery to increase the battery life. Intelligent BMS battery management and protection, reduce loss and long-term battery replacement.● Free Combination of 2 Brush Heads: Suitable for wooden floors/carpets/floor tiles. Equipped with a two-in-one slit nozzle for the surface of the home, and the host and the nozzle can also directly vacuum, easily deal with the whole house cleaning.● Lightweight Cordless Design: The cumbersome power cord is reduced, and the smart wireless design makes cleaning no longer limited to indoors. It can also be taken to the car to clean up.● A New Generation of Foldable Air Filte: Upgraded to introduce the H11 air-clean filter element,  further increasing the filter area. With the triple filter dust cabin structure, it can filter fine dust, and also prevent clogging .● Easy to Pour Out Trash & Washable Design: The dust cup and the main unit are designed to buckle, The dust cup and stainless steel filter screen can be washed with water. After drying, it can be recycled. ● Easy to Store: Equipped with a silicone hanger, it can be easily fixed without slipping.SpecificationBrand: DeermaModel: VC01MaxVoltage: 110-240VPower: 100WCharging Time: 4hRuntime: Standard Gear≥45min, High Gear≥20minDust Cup Capacity: 0.6LVacuum Degree: Standard Gear Up to 8000Pa, High Gear Up to 12000PaNoise: ≤78dBMaterial: ABSWater Tank Capacity: 200mlBattery InformationBattery Type: Li-ion batteryBattery Capacity: 2500mAhDimensionProduct Weight: 1.6kg Package Weight: 2.45kg Product Size: 21.00 x 18.00 x 115.50 cm Package Contents1 x Host1 x Take Over Assembly1 x Floor Brush Assembly1 x Water Tank Assembly1 x Mop Cloth1 x 2 in 1 Flat Suction1 x Type-C Charging Cable1 x Host Silicone Hanger1 x Manual1 x CN Plug(We will send you an adapter which according to your country)
